title: Is music helpful in reducing pain and mental health? - Quora

response.answer_text: Big YES !!!! Good Music gives dopamine rush. Soothing music relaxes you. Your favorite songs gives you happiness. Classical and instrumental music calms your mind. Just listen to music in higher volume…you get energized instantly..(not for longer periods) Music is food for soul

I totally agree with the statement that music is helpful in reducing pain and mental health. It depends on person to person how he/she treat music. But many times it's seen that music acts as a healer when a person is in depression.
